uvi.description:
hwmon: (w83792d) Fix NULL pointer dereference by removing unnecessary structure field

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.71 by commit 1499bb2c3a87a2efea0065adab2bd66badee61c3. For more details please see the references link.
